00053    function getRoles($userRef,$getNamedIds=true)
00054    { 
00055                 $userId = $this->getIdFromRef($userRef);
00056                 if ( ! $userId )
00057                 {
00058                         $this->raiseError("qx::security::user::getRoles : invalid user reference '$userRef'.");
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 if ($getNamedIds === null)
00062                 {
00063                         return $this->db->getAllRows("
00064                                 SELECT 
00065                                         r.*
00066                                 FROM 
00067                                         `{$this->role->table}` as r,
00068                                         `{$this->table_link_user_roles}` as l
00069                                 WHERE
00070                                         r.`{$this->role->key_id}` = l.`{$this->role->foreignKey}`
00071                                         AND l.`{$this->foreignKey}` = $userId
00072                         "); 
00073 
00074                 }
00075                 
00076                 $rows = $this->db->getAllRows("
00077                         SELECT
00078                                 r.`{$this->role->key_id}` as id,
00079                                 r.`{$this->role->key_namedId}` as nameId
00080                         FROM 
00081                                 `{$this->role->table}` as r,
00082                                 `{$this->table_link_user_roles}` as l
00083                         WHERE
00084                                 r.`{$this->role->key_id}` = l.`{$this->role->foreignKey}`
00085                                 AND l.`{$this->foreignKey}` = $userId
00086                 ");
00087                         
00088                 $result = array();
00089                 foreach ( $rows as $row )
00090                 {
00091                         $result[] = $getNamedIds ? $row['nameId'] : (int) $row['id'];
00092                 }
00093                 return $result;
00094    }

00099         function getRoleIds($userRef)
00100         {
00101                 return $this->getRoles($userRef,false);

00115         function getRoleRecords($userRef)
00116         {
00117                 return $this->getRoles($userRef,null);

00128    function getPermissions($userRef,$getNamedIds=true)
00129    {
00130                 $userId = $this->getIdFromRef($userRef);
00131                 if ( ! $userId )
00132                 {
00133                         $this->raiseError("qx::security::user::getPermissions : invalid user reference '$userRef'.");
00134                 }
00135                 
00136                 $myRoles = $this->getRoles($userRef,$getNamedIds);
00137                 
00138                 $result = array();
00139                 foreach ( $myRoles as $roleRef )
00140                 {
00141                         $result = array_unique(array_merge(
00142                                 $result,
00143                                 $this->role->getPermissions( $roleRef, $getNamedIds )
00144                         ));
00145                 }
00146                 return $result;
00147    }
00148    
00154    function authenticate ( $username, $password )
00155    {
00156                 $row = $this->getByName ( $username );
00157                 
00158                 if ( ! is_array($row) )
00159                 {
00160                         $this->error = "Unknown user name";
00161                         $this->setActiveUser(null);
00162                         return false;
00163                 }
00164                 
00165                 $savedPw = $row[$this->key_password]; 
00166                 
00167                 if ( ! $savedPw or 
00168                           $password === $savedPw or   
00169                           md5( $password ) === $savedPw or
00170                           $password === md5 ( $savedPw ) ) 
00171                 {
00172                         $this->setActiveUser($row);
00173                         return true;
00174                 }
00175                 else
00176                 {
00177                         $this->error = "Wrong Password";
00178                         $this->setActiveUser(null);
00179                         return false;
00180                 }
00181    }

00189                 return $_SESSION['qcl_auth_user_activeUser'];

00205    function getActiveUserId()
00206    {
00207                 return $_SESSION['qcl_auth_user_activeUser'][$this->key_id];

00218    function hasPermission($requestedPermission, $user=null)
00219    {
00220                 $user                   = $user ? $this->getByName($user) : $this->getActiveUser();
00221                 $username               = $user[$this->key_namedId];
00222                 $permissions    = $this->getPermissions($username);
00223                 foreach($permissions as $permission)
00224                 {
00225                         if ( $permission == $requestedPermission )
00226                         {
00227                                 return true;
00228                         }
00229                         elseif ( strstr($permission,"*") )
00230                         {
00231                                 $pos = strpos($permission,"*");
00232                                 if ( substr($permission,0,$pos) == substr($requestedPermission,0,$pos) )
00233                                 {
00234                                         return true;
00235                                 }
00236                         }
00237                 }
00238                 // permission was not found
00239                 return false;
00240    }
00241    
00247    function requirePermission($permission)
00248    {
00249                 if ( $this->hasPermission($permission) )
00250                 {
00251                         return true;
00252                 }
00253                 else
00254                 {
00255                         $this->raiseError("Permission denied");
00256                 }
00257    }
00258    
00264     function getSecurity($username)
00265     {
00266                 // userdata
00267                 $userdata = $this->getByName($username);
00268                 unset($userdata[$this->key_password]);
00269                 $roleNamedIds = $this->getRoles($username);
00270 
00271                 // roles and permissions
00272                 $roles = array();
00273                 $roleDescriptiveNames = array();
00274                 foreach ( $roleNamedIds as $roleNamedId )
00275                 {
00276                         
00277                         $roleDescriptiveNames[] = $this->role->getDescriptiveName($roleNamedId);
00278                         $roles[$roleNamedId]    = $this->role->getPermissions($roleNamedId);
00279                 }
00280                 
00281                 // security policy data for client
00282                 $userdata['roles'] = implode(", ",$roleDescriptiveNames);
00283                 $userdata['icon']  = $this->icon;
00284                 $security = array(
00285                         'userdata'      => $userdata,
00286                         'roles'         => $roles
00287                 );
00288                 return $security;
00289     }
00290 
00296     function addToRole( $userRefs, $roleRefs )
00297     {
00298         $userRefs       = (array) $userRefs;
00299         $roleRefs       = (array) $roleRefs;
00300         
00301         foreach ( $userRefs as $userRef )
00302         {
00303                 $userId = $this->getIdFromRef($userRef);
00304                 if ( ! $userId )
00305                 {
00306                         $this->raiseError("Invalid user reference: $userRef");
00307                 }
00308                 foreach ( $roleRefs as $roleRef )
00309                 {
00310                         $roleId = $this->role->getIdFromRef($roleRef);
00311                         if ( ! $roleId )
00312                         {
00313                                 $this->raiseError("Invalid role reference: $roleRef");
00314                         }
00315                         $row = array();
00316                         $row[$this->role->foreignKey] = $roleId;
00317                         $row[$this->foreignKey] = $userId; 
00318                         $this->db->insert($this->table_link_user_roles,$row);
00319                 }
00320         }       
00321         return true;
00322     }
00323 
00329     function removeFromRole( $userRefs, $roleRefs  )
00330     {
00331         $userRefs       = (array) $userRefs;
00332         $roleRefs       = (array) $roleRefs;
00333         
00334         foreach( $userRefs as $userRef )
00335         {
00336                 $userId = $this->getIdFromRef($userRef);
00337                 if ( ! $userId )
00338                 {
00339                         $this->raiseError("Invalid user reference: $userRef");
00340                 }
00341                 
00342                 foreach ( $roleRefs as $roleRef )
00343                 {
00344                         $roleId = $this->role->getIdFromRef($roleRef);
00345                         if ( ! $roleId )
00346                         {
00347                                 $this->raiseError("Invalid role reference: $roleRef");
00348                         }
00349                                 $this->db->execute("
00350                                         DELETE FROM `{$this->table_link_user_roles}`
00351                                         WHERE   `{$this->foreignKey}` = $userId
00352                                         AND     `{$this->role->foreignKey}` = $roleId
00353                                 ");
00354                 }
00355         }
00356         return true;
00357     }

00366    function method_updateClient($params)
00367    {
00368                 return $this->method_authenticate($params);
00369    }   
00370    
00376    function method_authenticate($params)
00377    {
00378                 $username       = utf8_decode($params[0]);
00379                 $password       = utf8_decode($params[1]);
00380                 $activeUser = $this->getActiveUser();
00381                 
00382                 // authenticate user if password matches
00383                 if ( $username and $this->authenticate ( $username, $password ) )
00384                 {
00385                         $security = $this->getSecurity($username);
00386                         $this->setActiveUser($security['userdata']);
00387                         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.loginSuccess");                                            
00388                 }
00389                 elseif ( ! $username and $activeUser )
00390                 {
00391                         $security = $this->getSecurity($activeUser[$this->key_username]);
00392                         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.loginSuccess");
00393                 }
00394                 else
00395                 {
00396                         $security = null;
00397                         $this->setActiveUser(null);
00398                         $this->addMessage( "qcl.auth.messages.loginFailed", $this->error );
00399                 }
00400                 
00401                 $this->set("security", $security );
00402                 
00403                 return $this->getResult();
00404    }   
00405    
00409    function method_logout()
00410    {
00411                 $this->setActiveUser(null);
00412                 $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.user.loggedOut");
00413                 return $this->getResult();
00414    }   
00415 
00422     function method_addToRole($params)
00423     {
00424         $this->requirePermission("qcl.auth.manage");
00425         
00426         $userRefs       = $params[1];
00427         $roleRefs       = $params[2];
00428         
00429         $this->addToRole($userRefs,$roleRefs); 
00430         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.user.roleAdded",$userRefs);
00431         return $this->getResult();
00432     }
00433    
00440     function method_removeFromRole($params)
00441     {
00442         $this->requirePermission("qcl.auth.manage");
00443         
00444         $userRefs       = $params[1];
00445         $roleRefs       = $params[2];
00446 
00447         $this->removeFromRole($userRefs,$roleRefs);
00448 
00449         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.user.roleRemoved",$userRefs); 
00450         return $this->getResult();
00451     }
